shows.title: Dream Nails
shows.desc:
We’re delighted to welcome back Dream Nails after their 2018 Greenbelt debut. Formed out the DIY punk community, since releasing their first EP in 2016 the self-styled punk witches have built a reputation in London and Europe for their riotous live shows, supported Cherry Glazerr, Bleached and Petrol Girls, and headlined Glastonbury's women-only Sisterhood stage.

------------------------

Part of the Dream Nails Takeover programme where we say......GIRLS TO THE FRONT!

Take up space!

All public – and even private – spaces are dominated by men. Women and non-binary people taking back space is a radical act of liberation.

Women and non-binary people: Our songs are for you. Everyone is welcome at our shows, but we don’t write feminist music just so men can block your view!

After every single show, women and non-binary people tell us how much they appreciate being in a space where they can dance and have fun together. We say ‘Girls to the front’ in honour of our Riot Grrrl fore-sisters, but we really mean…

Men to the back!

We didn’t spend years at shows growing up (unable to see, groped and violently pushed) to recreate the same feelings in our female fans. All our male fans stand at the back, in a small but vital act of allyship.

Hopefully one day we won’t have to say it any more. Hopefully one day we’ll live in a world where male entitlement no longer exists, and where women feel truly safe.

But until that world is built from our blood, sweat and bare hands…

GIRLS TO THE FRONT!

shows.title: Zine Making Workshop
shows.desc: Dream Nails, feminist punk witches from London, are sharing their zine-making skills.  They believe in the ‘DIY’ (Do-It-Yourself) ethic, and that being self-sufficient is a radical act against the capitalist patriarchy.  Cut and paste your own ideas for the revolution, and leave with your own mini zine.

shows.title: The Daily Mirror
shows.desc: Featuring the festival’s smartest thinkers, artists and activists, including you! Cole Moreton helps us look beyond the headlines to try and work out what’s really going on in the world. Come prepared to listen, laugh and have your say.
